fields.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
fields.overview: Learn the basics of supervised and unsupervised learning, algorithms like linear regression, k-means, and decision trees.

fields.title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow
fields.overview: Explore neural networks, CNNs, and RNNs with TensorFlow for building real-world AI applications.

fields.title: Data Visualization & Analytics
fields.overview: Discover techniques for transforming complex datasets into clear, actionable visual insights using Python libraries.

fields.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP) Fundamentals
fields.overview: Understand text preprocessing, sentiment analysis, and transformers like BERT for real-world language applications.

fields.title: Python Programming for Beginners
fields.overview: A step-by-step guide to learning Python — from basic syntax to working with data and creating simple apps.

fields.title: Algorithms and Data Structures
fields.overview: Master core algorithms, sorting techniques, and data structures essential for efficient software development.

fields.title: Web Development with Django
fields.overview: Build powerful, database-driven websites using Django and understand the fundamentals of back-end web development.

fields.title: Software Design Patterns
fields.overview: Learn reusable software design principles for building maintainable and scalable applications.

fields.title: Microcontroller Programming with Arduino
fields.overview: Build interactive projects and learn C-based programming for embedded systems.

fields.title: Digital Circuit Design
fields.overview: Understand the foundations of digital logic, gates, and circuit design using simulation tools.

fields.title: IoT Systems & Prototyping
fields.overview: Learn how sensors, cloud services, and hardware interact to create connected IoT ecosystems.

fields.title: Introduction to Robotics
fields.overview: Learn the fundamentals of robotics — sensors, actuators, and control systems for real-world robots.

fields.title: Automation and Control Systems
fields.overview: Explore PID controllers, industrial automation, and feedback systems used in modern engineering.

fields.title: Networking Fundamentals
fields.overview: Study TCP/IP, DNS, and network topologies to understand how modern computer networks operate.

fields.title: Cloud Computing with AWS & Azure
fields.overview: Gain practical knowledge of deploying and managing cloud-based systems using industry-leading platforms.

fields.title: Getting Started with Python
fields.description: Learn how to install Python, use the interpreter, and write your first “Hello World” program

fields.title: Data Types and Variables
fields.description: Understand Python’s core data types — strings, integers, floats, and lists — and how to store data efficiently.

fields.title: Control Flow and Functions
fields.description: Master if-else statements, loops, and how to structure code using reusable functions.

fields.title: Working with Files
fields.description: Learn how to read and write files, handle exceptions, and work with file paths in Python.

fields.title: Introduction to Algorithms
fields.description: Explore what algorithms are, how to measure performance, and how to implement simple examples.

fields.title: Sorting and Searching
fields.description: Learn about common algorithms like quicksort, mergesort, and binary search with hands-on coding exercises.

fields.title: Stacks, Queues, and Linked Lists
fields.description: Understand linear data structures and how they’re used in everyday software applications.

fields.title: Trees and Graphs
fields.description: Dive into advanced data structures and learn traversal techniques used in modern computing.

fields.title: Introduction to Django Framework
fields.description: Discover the Django architecture, installation, and setting up your first project.

fields.title: Models and Database Integration
fields.description: Learn how Django ORM works to manage data and interact with databases seamlessly.

fields.title: Views and Templates
fields.description: Understand how Django handles logic and presentation layers for dynamic web pages.

fields.title: Forms and User Input
fields.description: Create interactive forms, handle POST requests, and validate user input.

fields.title: Authentication and Authorization
fields.description: Implement user login, registration, and permission-based access controls.

fields.title: Deployment and Optimization
fields.description: Learn how to deploy your Django app to production and optimize for performance and security.

fields.title: Creational Patterns
fields.description: Explore patterns like Singleton, Factory, and Builder for creating flexible object instances.

fields.title: Structural Patterns
fields.description: Learn Adapter, Facade, and Decorator patterns to manage relationships between classes.

fields.title: Behavioral Patterns
fields.description: Study patterns like Observer, Strategy, and Command that control communication between objects.

fields.title: Introduction to Computer Networks
fields.description: Understand the basic concepts of computer networking, including types of networks, topology, and data transmission fundamentals.

fields.title: Network Protocols and Models
fields.description: Learn about the OSI and TCP/IP models, how data flows across networks, and the role of key protocols such as IP, TCP, and UDP.

fields.title: Routing and Switching Basics
fields.description: Explore how routers and switches manage data traffic, routing tables, and IP addressing to ensure efficient communication.

fields.title: Network Security and Troubleshooting
fields.description: Gain practical skills in securing networks, detecting issues, and using diagnostic tools like ping and traceroute to troubleshoot problems.

fields.title: What is a Computer Network?
fields.content: A computer network is a group of interconnected devices that communicate and share resources with each other. Networks can range from small home setups to massive global infrastructures like the Internet. Networking allows data to be exchanged efficiently and securely between computers, servers, and other hardware.

fields.title: Why Networking Matters
fields.content: Networking is the backbone of modern communication — enabling everything from online learning and cloud computing to IoT and remote work. Understanding how networks operate is crucial for anyone pursuing a career in IT or cybersecurity.
